subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Admitting that their brand had been damaged by years of mismanagement, the Trail Blazers embarked on a campaign of credibility restoration. Could the Knicks follow such a course in New York?
snippet: Admitting that their brand had been damaged by years of mismanagement, the Trail Blazers embarked on a campaign of credibility restoration. Could the Knicks follow such a course in New York?
